mapper.select: SELECT * FROM daily_all_make_card ORDER BY create_time DESC limit 1
SELECT * FROM daily_all_activate_card ORDER BY create_time DESC limit 1
SELECT * FROM daily_exchange_information ORDER BY create_time DESC limit 1
SELECT * FROM daily_registered_user ORDER BY create_time DESC limit 1
SELECT * FROM daily_registered_user_balance ORDER BY create_time DESC limit 1
SELECT * FROM exchanged_and_activate_count ORDER BY create_time DESC limit 1
SELECT * FROM payment_statistics ORDER BY create_time DESC limit 1
SELECT * FROM all_estimate_price ORDER BY create_time DESC limit 1
SELECT * FROM all_settle_accounts_price ORDER BY create_time DESC limit 1
SELECT face_value,total_count FROM ordinary_card where create_time = #{createTime}
SELECT face_value,total_count FROM custom_card where create_time = #{createTime}

SELECT case when deduction = 0 then '自营' when deduction = 1 then '京东' when deduction = 3 then '淘宝' when deduction = 4 then '天猫' when deduction = 11 then '拼多多' else '未知' end deduction, total_amount, total_customer FROM platform_coupon_exchange where create_time = #{createTime}
SELECT deduction_count, total_customer FROM exchange_frequency where create_time = #{createTime} ORDER BY rank_num

SELECT sku_id, sku_name, case when deduction = 0 then '自营' when deduction = 1 then '京东' when deduction = 3 then '淘宝' when deduction = 4 then '天猫' when deduction = 11 then '拼多多' else '未知' end deduction, sku_count, row_num FROM exchanged_goods_rank where create_time = #{createTime} order by row_num
SELECT the_hr as theTime, total_amount as totalCount FROM exchange_card_yesterday where create_time = #{createTime}
SELECT data_time as create_time, sum(total_amount) as activieTotal, round(sum(total_amount)/24,4) as avgAmount FROM exchange_card_yesterday where create_time = #{createTime} group by create_time
SELECT the_day as theTime, total_amount as totalCount FROM exchange_card_seven where create_time = #{createTime}
SELECT max(scope) as createTime, sum(total_amount) as activieTotal, round(sum(total_amount)/7,4) as avgAmount FROM exchange_card_seven where create_time = #{createTime} group by create_time
SELECT sum(total_amount) as activieTotal FROM exchange_card_next_seven where create_time = #{createTime} group by create_time
SELECT the_day as theTime, total_amount as totalCount FROM exchange_card_thirty where create_time = #{createTime}
SELECT max(scope) as createTime, sum(total_amount) as activieTotal, round(sum(total_amount)/30,4) as avgAmount FROM exchange_card_thirty where create_time = #{createTime} group by create_time
SELECT sum(total_amount) as activieTotal FROM exchange_card_next_thirty where create_time = #{createTime} group by create_time
SELECT the_month as theTime, total_amount as totalCount FROM exchange_card_month where the_month = #{theMonth}
SELECT concat_ws('--',min(the_month),max(the_month)) as createTime, round(sum(total_amount)/12 ,4)as avgAmount FROM exchange_card_month where the_month >= #{beginMonth} and the_month <= #{endMonth}
SELECT the_month as theTime, total_amount as totalCount FROM exchange_card_month where the_month >= #{beginMonth} and the_month <= #{endMonth} order by the_month
SELECT the_hr as theTime, total_amount as totalCount FROM activated_card_yesterday where data_time = #{dataTime}
SELECT data_time as createTime, sum(total_amount) as activieTotal, round(sum(total_amount)/24,4) as avgAmount FROM activated_card_yesterday where data_time = #{dataTime} group by data_time

SELECT the_month as theTime, total_amount as totalCount FROM activated_card_month where the_month >= #{beginMonth} and the_month <= #{endMonth} order by the_month

SELECT the_date as theTime, FLOOR(estimate_price) as totalCount FROM all_estimate_platform_thirty where create_time = #{date} and deduction = #{deduction} order by the_date
SELECT the_hr as theTime, exchange_times as totalCount FROM analysis_platform_exchange_yesterday where create_time = #{date} and deduction = #{deduction} order by the_hr * 1
SELECT the_date as theTime, exchange_times as totalCount FROM analysis_platform_exchange_seven where create_time = #{date} and deduction = #{deduction} order by the_date
SELECT the_date as theTime, exchange_times as totalCount FROM analysis_platform_exchange_thirty where create_time = #{date} and deduction = #{deduction} order by the_date
SELECT the_hr as theTime, payment_times as totalCount FROM payment_platform_yesterday where create_time = #{date} and deduction = #{deduction} order by the_hr * 1
SELECT the_date as theTime, payment_times as totalCount FROM payment_platform_seven where create_time = #{date} and deduction = #{deduction} order by the_date
SELECT the_date as theTime, payment_times as totalCount FROM payment_platform_thirty where create_time = #{date} and deduction = #{deduction} order by the_date
SELECT FLOOR(total_amount) as price, FLOOR(total_count) as numbers FROM exchanged_amount_statistics where create_time = #{date} order by deduction * 1
SELECT FLOOR(payment_amount) as price, FLOOR(payment_times) as numbers FROM payment_amount_statistics where create_time = #{date} order by deduction * 1
SELECT FLOOR(estimate_price) as price, FLOOR(payment_times) as numbers FROM estimate_amount_statistics where create_time = #{date} order by deduction * 1
SELECT FLOOR(payment_amount) as price, FLOOR(payment_times) as numbers FROM commission_amount_statistics where create_time = #{date} order by deduction * 1
